channel.title: Packet editing
channel.description:
So im trying to work off a base of packet editing in online games but its not very simple im slowly finding out but, im posting here because i wanted to start touching in on doing it on a rsps if i could find a good base to work off of then i would be willing to put together a global cheat client for each revision.
I'm sure im gonna hear troll after troll about this but i dont really care to be honest. you wanna troll shoot me an email and we'll see what happens to you comp, dont post it here.
anyways i was just wondering what you guys think. would this be a good base for a cheat client since the communication between client and server is all packets anyway right?
opinions? possible? good or bad idea?
and ill keep you updated as far as the whole packet editing in a rsps goes. but im not entirely sure its possible to be honest just cause of the amount of security build into runescapes infastructure but if its a non leeched base then it shouldnt be a problem right? most people wouldnt think to make some kind of protection for this i would think
That or im just blowing smoke outta my ass and wasting my time on something that just isnt possible?

item.title: Packet editing
item.dc:creator: @patargangstar patargangstar
item.description:
@patargangstar wrote:

i did mean rsps. i wouldnt fuck with rs servers i dont wanna get buttraped in prison

Read full topic

item.title: Packet editing
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”][quote author=HcoJustin link=topic=493452.msg3607835#msg3607835 date=1306280456]
It’s worth a shot, but every server edits the packets to get what they want done nowadays.
[/quote]not arcanists; jagex fucked up on that
so much packet editing on there ;D

@op use wpe pro :D[/quote]

I assumed he meant for rsps… Every client out there that has clan chat, lootshare, etc. have changed various packets to make it all work

Read full topic

item.title: Packet editing
item.dc:creator: @patargangstar patargangstar
item.description:
@patargangstar wrote:

vain didnt you have like 200 rep and were a server helper? and i do use wpe pro

Read full topic

item.title: Packet editing
item.dc:creator: @patargangstar patargangstar
item.description:
@patargangstar wrote:

yea… its gonna take a while to figure out all the packet adresses i need to make a good list of cheats but that makes me think… am i gonna have to find new packets for every different source??

Read full topic
